data.name: PaperOne
data.descript: Paper One is a painting application which is imitating the real paintbrush!
data.descript-zh: Paper One是一款模擬真實畫筆的繪畫應用，瞬間把手機和平板變成你的手繪本！

data.name: PhotoText
data.descript: Phototext is an image-text production application which is concise and fantastic !
data.descript-zh: Phototext是一款簡潔流暢的圖文製作應用
